name: The Academys Genius Tamer
author: Kang Seoul &#40강서울&#41
content: Our protagonist has reincarnated as Han Siha, a minor villain in the dark fantasy novel he once loved. To live a peaceful life without getting tangled up with the protagonists, graduating from the academy is a must. But for Han Siha, who has no magical talent and terrible social skills, this is an almost impossible task.
